summary: MODEL #207104P3 CONSUMERS VEHICLE WAS HIT BY ANOTHER DRIVER THAT WAS TRAVELING AT 40 MPH.  CONSUMER STATED THE CHILD SAFETY SEAT CAME FLYING OUT OF THE BASE THAT WAS IN THE MIDDLE REAR SEATING POSITION.  THE CHILD WAS THROWN TO THE REAR OF THE VAN.  PLEASE PROVIDE ANY FURTHER INFORMATION.*JB
